pr_title: [Dart2] Fix a bug when asking to upload a MultipartFile as body.

timeline.message: Fix a bug when asking to upload a MultipartFile as body.

timeline.bodyText: Some use dartfmt to reformat the generated code, this would make it look nicer for them. Same below.
timeline.author: noordawod

timeline.message: Restrict creating a MultipartFileRequest when not part of a multipart-form.
Simplified the upload to use a StreamedRequest.
